about_the_game:
Interested In Making Dumb Random Maps To Play With Your Friends?
Wanna become a Leader of a group?

Well Player...

You have come to the Right Place!

  • Brick-City contains A Map Editor, so now you can Make maps To Play With Friends!
  • UGC Approved Shirts! UGC Maps UGC Catalog
  • Community Events, Soon to Come Events!

Welcome to Brick-City a fun relaxing multiplayer hangout game where people from all across the world can meet up and mess around, This game's main features are: Multiplayer, Character customizing, Chat, Physics, And more, Join the discord to learn more and make some friends
detailed_description:
Join The Discord!

To Upload a Shirt You Made, Or Ask Questions Or Just Say Hi, Join The Discord!


About the Game

Interested In Making Dumb Random Maps To Play With Your Friends?
Wanna become a Leader of a group?

Well Player...

You have come to the Right Place!

  • Brick-City contains A Map Editor, so now you can Make maps To Play With Friends!
  • UGC Approved Shirts! UGC Maps UGC Catalog
  • Community Events, Soon to Come Events!

Welcome to Brick-City a fun relaxing multiplayer hangout game where people from all across the world can meet up and mess around, This game's main features are: Multiplayer, Character customizing, Chat, Physics, And more, Join the discord to learn more and make some friends
ext_user_account_notice: Microsoft Playfab (Supports Linking to Steam Account)
name: Brick City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Version 1507
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Silver N6000
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Specs Have Not Been Tested Or Verified To Run Brick-City
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version 21H1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These Specs Have Not Been Tested Or Verified To Run Brick-City

short_description: Play a normal relaxed paced multi-player game Mainly focused on Hanging out with your buds and making your own playable maps!
